attributes.additional_details: Rough figures are simply not good enough. Specific vaccination data will help build trust in the vaccination programme and, more than that, it will provide us with a positive source of news each day, which we're all in need of at this point in time.
attributes.background:
The USA and Canada now releasing specific daily vaccination figures. The UK is one week ahead in terms of vaccinations but we still only have rough estimates of vaccinations.

We should have specific geographic and demographic data at this point on number of vaccine doses administered.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564526
